events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position submitted by the candidate at 9:15 AM. The resume indicates strong experience in backend development using Java and Python.
The application was reviewed and categorized under Engineering based on the keywords such as Software Engineer and backend developer mentioned in the candidate's profile.
Recruiter Maria Thompson has been assigned to handle this candidate's recruitment process and will proceed with the initial contact and screening.
Conducted the initial screening call with the candidate discussing technical background, previous projects with microservices architecture, and interest in DevOps practices.
Candidate promptly responded to the screening feedback expressing enthusiasm for the upcoming technical interview and availability for scheduling.
Scheduled the technical interview for the candidate on 2024-05-05 at 2:00 PM UTC with the senior engineering panel to evaluate coding and system design skills.
